code: var isMobileNumberValid=function isMobileNumberValid(ph){var regX=new RegExp(/^((?!(0))[0-9]{10})$/);return regX.test(ph);};var isNumericField=function isNumericField(num){var regX=new RegExp(/^\d*[.]?\d*$/);return regX.test(num.toString());};var isEmailValid=function isEmailValid(email){var regX=new RegExp(/^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+(\.[_a-zA-Z0-9]+)*@[a-z0-9-]+(\.[a-z0-9-]+)*(\.[a-z]{2,15})$/);return regX.test(email);};var isPanNumberValid=function isPanNumberValid(pan){var regX=new RegExp(/^([a-zA-Z]){5}([0-9]){4}([a-zA-Z]){1}?$/);return regX.test(pan);};var isEmpty=function isEmpty(str){return str.length===0?true:false;};export{isMobileNumberValid,isEmailValid,isEmpty,isNumericField,isPanNumberValid};
